article_metadata.description: Admittedly, this guy knew something about innovation. (Image via CrunchBase) Innovation isn't easy, but based on some of these recent stories about the topic, it can indeed be done. It requires shifting, tweaking, or flipping your perspective so that you see things you don't normally see. Tip No. 1: Look where you [...]
